Biostatistics

I am using whole genome sequencing data from the 100k Genomes Project to determine the mutations which drive cancer progression and are targetable by available therapies.

Mutation Signatures

I’m applying non-negative matrix factorisation (NNMF) to determine the distinct patterns of mutations, referred to as signatures, which occur in our cells throughout our lives and during tumourigenesis.
